name: Mouse House (Ludum Dare 37)
description:
It's Mouse House, a black and white game where you have to escape from the humans and cats!

Controls:

RIGHT or D: Turn right

LEFT or A: Turn left

UP or W: Move forwards

Avoid the projectiles thrown by the humans and run away from the cats. Pick up cheeses to get a short boost! Make your way to the mouse hole in the bottom left corner to win.
